txt.en: 'We can not hide behind the bog reeds and hope that no one sees us. We have been seen.'
'That [placeholder] helped me find my toy! The ugly beetles took it, and [placeholder] brought it back!'
'I do not like duvodiad. My mam told me never to trust them. Make them go away!'
'Thank you, child, but hush now. The adults must speak.'
'Hush, Gemma. Assembly is not the time for you to speak!'
'Thank you, Gwin. We appreciate your thoughts as always. Who else?'
'This...duvodiad would not even help me rest after an epic battle with the avanc. I will not agree that we should listen to [placeholder].'
'Avanc-l√ªth! The Assembly has begun.'
'I will vouch for [placeholder]. #-1:[placeholder] #-1:{He[m]|She[f]|It} defeated the great Bloodmaw and proved to be better than all of my hunters!'
'We have lived here for a very long time. Our lives have become comfortable.'
'The Elders are convinced that this duvodiad brings us great danger. But also, this brave [placeholder] brings hope!'
'But that comfort is now gone. Saruman threatens our very way of life!'
'We have seen the effects of the Abominations for some time now. Saruman did this. I believe it in my heart.'
'Many of you have had dealings with the duvodiad named [placeholder].'
'I know that we swore to keep our tusks buried in the mud. But we can no longer do this and live!'
'The threat of war spreads even to us. We must act. I will hear from any who wish to speak.'
'[placeholder] has done the people of the Dunbog a great service. We have too long met duvodiad with fear.'
[placeholder] is a true gift to the people of the Dunbog. Saving the Abomina--'
'Gift? [placeholder] failed when the time came for the finishing blow. Do you know what you have done?'
'All I know is that [placeholder] protected the Tree from Saruman's men. That is all I need to know.'
'Why can you not see that the Abominations are people too? We must be kind to them. They have gone through so m--'
'We have heard from many. Does anyone else wish to speak?'
'Enough! This is not the time to squabble like children.'
'No one else?'
'[placeholder] was amazing, destroying the Abominations completely! I will proudly follow into battle!'
'Then it is settled. We will prepare for war against any who stand with Saruman. [placeholder], we will speak again.'
'You are terrible!'
'Pathetic.'
'Clearly, [placeholder] was responsible for showing us what Saruman did. That is all that matters!'
'I am suitably impressed with the confidence [placeholder] shows. I will agree with the Elders. The time to act is upon us.'
'We had no trouble with Saruman until this duvodiad appeared. Perhaps [placeholder] is working for Saruman?'
